comprehensive_overview: R-FDb.InfiniumMethylation.Hg19 provides access to pre-processed and harmonized methylation array datasets from Infinium HumanMethylation 450K and EPIC arrays in human genome build hg19. It allows for easy retrieval of DNA methylation data for downstream analysis in R.
core_features: Access to pre-processed methylation array datasets
Harmonized data for Infinium HumanMethylation 450K and EPIC arrays
Retrieval of DNA methylation data for analysis in R
